attributes.action: Bring back the sofas to 8SQ in Birkenhead Sixth Form College.
attributes.additional_details:
'In the UK right now, couches have been forced out of certain sections of school/college society. I hereby suggest that we replace every lost couch from each school and college in the country.' Joe, 18.

'This is an outrage, we've got money to bomb Syria but we can't afford to spend on the comfort of our young people!' Sarah, 17.

'I have to sit on a plastic chair now, and I can't concentrate on my work!' Elvis, 17.
attributes.background: Dear Nicky Morgan, Minister of Education, the sofas in the refectory of Birkenhead Sixth Form College have recently been removed, leaving 1500 students with nowhere especially comfortable to sit and socialise. This is of essence to our education, and I hope these unnecessary cuts can be reversed.
